Data is an aggregate of reports from various Akamai internal systems. Data was pulled periodically throughout 2022 and provided by Akamai’s internal people analytics team. Akamai is a GDPR compliant company.
Other Minority includes American Indian or Alaska Native, Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander and Two or More Races.
